QuestData.Title: The Southern Wilds
QuestData.Description: First the Iron Horde, then the Shadowmoon orcs, and now there's trouble brewing to the south!$B$BMy brother is a feyrider to the south, at the Draakorium.$B$BHe says that creatures from the swamp are venturing onto our lands. What is this world coming to?$B$BAnyway, you look like a seasoned adventurer. If you are heading that way, would you mind checking in over there?
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Prelate Reenu at The Draakorium.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you for coming to our aid.
